data.text:
EON Productions

Litho in USA, 1989. [Film promotion] U.S. one-sheet poster for the 1989 MGM/UA film starring Timothy Dalton as Ian Fleming's James Bond, produced by Cubby Broccoli and Michael G. Wilson's EON Productions. Approximate dimensions 27 x 40 inches. Designed by Tony Synegar, with photography by Keith Hamshere and Douglas Kirkland. Never folded. Some creases to lower edge; fine condition (Poster Grade 'A'). Will be despatched rolled, in a substantial card tube. Note on Format; the 'one-sheet' is a portrait [vertical] view American or International movie poster, measuring approx. 27 x 40 inches. Prior to the 1980s they were generally issued folded with one vertical and three horizontal creases. This is the standard American film poster format, and essentially the US equivalent of the British quad. Item #53554

Nourmand, Tony. James Bond Movie Posters, pp.170.
